30#ifndef _ATOMICIO_H
31#define _ATOMICIO_H
32
33struct iovec;
34
35/*
36 * Ensure all of data on socket comes through. f==read || f==vwrite
37 */
38size_t
39atomicio6(ssize_t (*f) (int, void *, size_t), int fd, void *_s, size_t n,
40 int (*cb)(void *, size_t), void *);
41size_t atomicio(ssize_t (*)(int, void *, size_t), int, void *, size_t);
42
43#define vwrite (ssize_t (*)(int, void *, size_t))write
44
45/*
46 * ensure all of data on socket comes through. f==readv || f==writev
47 */
48size_t
49atomiciov6(ssize_t (*f) (int, const struct iovec *, int), int fd,
50 const struct iovec *_iov, int iovcnt, int (*cb)(void *, size_t), void *);
51size_t atomiciov(ssize_t (*)(int, const struct iovec *, int),
52 int, const struct iovec *, int);
53
54#endif /* _ATOMICIO_H */
55
